UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the SymptoScan application.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

Diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
Diagnosis.description: Stores a diagnosis generated by the AI for a user.

symptoms.description: The symptoms provided by the user for this diagnosis.

medicalHistory.description: The medical history provided for this diagnosis, if any.

possibleConditions.description: List of possible medical conditions suggested by the AI.

confidenceLevel.description: The AI's confidence in the diagnosis.

nextSteps.description: Recommended next steps for the user.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the diagnosis was generated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Only the authenticated user can read or write their own profile.

/users/{userId}/diagnoses/{diagnosisId}.description: Stores diagnoses generated for a specific user. Only the owning user can create, read, update, or delete their diagnoses.
